data.title: Carl & Katy in the Aura Gown
data.author: John Dio
data.description: Our beautiful #GRACEBride Katy wears AURA, whilst getting hitched with new hubby Carl at their picturesque wedding venue - Wine + Garden, Ft. Lauderdale in Florida.

data.title: Carol & Katia in the Summer Gown
data.author: John Dio
data.description: #GRACEBride Katia and husband Carol got hitched in Côte d’Azur, South of France – with the theme of their wedding being chic and elegant; white, beige and pink flowers decorated their special day. Katia is from Paris and Carol grew up by the seaside of Romania, so this venue was the perfect combination for the lovers.​

data.title: Chad & Davi in the Nathalia Gown
data.author: John Dio
data.description: Introducing our first NATHALIA #GRACEBride and wow is she coming in with a bang! Davionna and Chad exchanged vows at their romantic Santorini elopement - Euro summer goals!

data.title: Maurice & Kris in the Orla Gown
data.author: John Dio
data.description: #GRACEBRIDEKris wears our ORLA gown, eloping at the naturally beautiful Joshua Tree, Los Angeles.

data.title: Slater & Stacie in the Verdelle 2.0 Gown
data.author: John Dio
data.description: #GRACEBride Stacie and new hubby Slater took the 'western boho' wedding vibe to a whole new level and we can't get enough. These two lovebirds exchanged vows in Sun Valley, Idaho on Slater's family property. This special 50 acre ranch has been in the family over 100 years!
